masterGrammar.rule: rule {DP option CaseI - initial Case marker on DP, remaining DP instead of PP} DP = Case DP_1 <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <Case head type comma> = - <Case head type DP-initial> = + <DP_1 head type pronoun> = - <DP_1 head type case-marked> = - <DP head case> <= <Case head case> <DP head type relative> <= - <DP head type case-marked> <= + <DP option> = CaseI

rule {DP option CaseF - final Case marker on DP, remaining DP instead of PP} DP = DP_1 Case <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <Case head type DP-final> = + <DP_1 head type comma> = - <DP_1 head type pronoun> = - <DP_1 head type case-marked> = - <DP head type comma> <= <Case head type comma> <DP head case> <= <Case head case> <DP head type relative> <= - <DP head type case-marked> <= + <DP option> = CaseF

rule {DP option CaseBoth - initial and final Case markers on DP, remaining DP instead of PP} DP = Case_1 DP_1 Case_2 <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <Case_1 head type DP-initial> = + <Case_2 head type DP-final> = + <Case_1 head type comma> = - <DP_1 head type comma> = - <DP_1 head type pronoun> = - <DP_1 head type case-marked> = - <DP head type comma> <= <Case_2 head type comma> <DP head case> <= <Case_1 head case> <Case_2 head case> <= <Case_1 head case> <DP head type relative> <= - <DP head type case-marked> <= + <DP option> = CaseBoth

rule {DP option NegI} DP = Neg DP_1 <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <DP head modifier> = <Neg> <Neg head type DP-initial> = + <Neg head type comma> = - <DP head infl polarity> <= negative <DP head type prefix> <= <Neg head type prefix> <DP option> = NegI

rule {DP option NegF} DP = DP_1 Neg <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <DP head modifier> = <Neg> <Neg head type DP-final> = + <DP_1 head type comma> = - <DP head infl polarity> <= negative <DP head type suffix> <= <Neg head type suffix> <DP head type comma> <= <Neg head type comma> <DP option> = NegF

rule {DP option NegBoth} DP = Neg_1 DP_1 Neg_2 <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <DP head modifier> = <Neg_1> <Neg_1 head type DP-initial> = + <Neg_2 head type DP-final> = + <Neg_1 head type comma> = - <DP_1 head type comma> = - <DP head infl polarity> <= negative <DP head type prefix> <= <Neg_1 head type prefix> <DP head type suffix> <= <Neg_2 head type suffix> <DP head type comma> <= <Neg_2 head type comma> <DP option> = NegBoth
rule {DP option NegProclitic} DP = DP_1 <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <DP head infl polarity> <= negative <DP_1 head type prefix negative> <= + <DP option> = NegProclitic
rule {DP option NegEnclitic} DP = DP_1 <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <DP head infl polarity> <= negative <DP_1 head type suffix negative> <= + <DP option> = NegEnclitic
rule {DP option QProclitic} DP = DP_1 <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <DP_1 head type prefix quantifier> <= + <DP option> = QProclitic
rule {DP option QEnclitic} DP = DP_1 <DP head> = <DP_1 head> <DP_1 head type suffix quantifier> <= + <DP option> = QEnclitic

rule {DP option conj - conjoined DPs} DP = (InitConj) DP_1 Conj DP_2 <DP head> = <DP_2 head> <DP conjoined> = + <DP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <DP_2 head type relative> = - <DP head infl polarity> <= <Conj head infl polarity> <DP head agr number> <= <Conj head agr number> <DP option> = conj

rule {DP option conjPrefix - conjoined DPs} DP = DP_1 DP_2 <DP head> = <DP_2 head> <DP conjoined> = + <DP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <DP_2 head type prefix conj> = + <DP_2 head type relative> = - <DP head infl polarity> <= <DP_2 head conj head infl polarity> <DP head agr number> <= <DP_2 head conj head agr number> <DP option> = conjPrefix

rule {DP option conjSuffix - conjoined DPs} DP = DP_1 DP_2 <DP head> = <DP_2 head> <DP conjoined> = + <DP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <DP_1 head type suffix conj> = + <DP_2 head type relative> = - <DP head infl polarity> <= <DP_1 head conj head infl polarity> <DP head agr number> <= <DP_1 head conj head agr number> <DP option> = conjSuffix

rule {DP option conjNone - conjoined DPs} DP = DP_1 DP_2 <DP head> = <DP_2 head> <DP conjoined> = + <DP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <DP_2 head type prefix conj> = - <DP_1 head type suffix conj> = - <DP_1 head type comma> = - <DP_2 head type relative> = - <DP option> = conjNone

rule {DP option conjListAppos - conjoined DPs, lists and appositives} DP = DP_1 DP_2 <DP head> = <DP_2 head> <DP conjoined> = + <DP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <DP_2 head type prefix conj> = - <DP_1 head type suffix conj> = - | <DP_1 head type comma> = + | activate this constraint if/when you make comma a word-formation character | until then you will get ambiguity if you also have DP option conjNone, so deactivate one rule <DP_2 head type relative> = - <DP head type prefix> <= <DP_1 head type prefix> <DP option> = conjListAppos

rule {DP option RelCP - headless relative CP} DP = CP <DP head> = <CP head> <DP head type case-marked> = - <CP head type relative> = + <CP head type verbheaded> = + | to restrict recursion <DP head type> <= <DP head type prefix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP head type> <= <DP head type suffix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP option> = RelCP

rule {DP option RelIP - headless relative IP} DP = IP <DP head> = <IP head> <DP head type case-marked> = - <IP head type relative> = + <IP head type verbheaded> = + | to restrict recursion <DP head type> <= <DP head type prefix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP head type> <= <DP head type suffix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP option> = RelIP

rule {DP option IndefPronI - interrogative indef phrase, initial} DP = Pron Indef <DP head> = <Indef head> <DP head type case-marked> = - <Pron head type wh> = + <Pron head type DP-initial> = + <DP head type prefix> <= <Pron head type prefix> <DP head type suffix> <= <Indef head type suffix> <DP option> = IndefPronI

rule {DP option IndefPronBoth - interrogative indef phrase, both} DP = Pron_1 Indef Pron_2 <DP head> = <Indef head> <DP head type case-marked> = - <Pron_1 head type wh> = + <Pron_2 head type wh> = + <Pron_1 head type DP-initial> = + <Pron_2 head type DP-final> = + <DP head type prefix> <= <Pron_1 head type prefix> <DP head type suffix> <= <Pron_2 head type suffix> <DP option> = IndefPronBoth

rule {DP option QPronI - quantifier indef phrase, initial} DP = Q N <DP head> = <N head> <DP head type case-marked> = - <N head type generic> = + <Q head type DP-initial> = + <DP head type prefix> <= <Q head type prefix> <DP head type suffix> <= <N head type suffix> <DP option> = QPronI

rule {DP option QPronF - quantifier indef phrase, final} DP = N Q <DP head> = <N head> <DP head type case-marked> = - <N head type generic> = + <Q head type DP-final> = + <DP head type prefix> <= <N head type prefix> <DP head type suffix> <= <Q head type suffix> <DP option> = QPronF

rule {DP option QPronBoth - quantifier indef phrase, both sides} DP = Q_1 N Q_2 <DP head> = <N head> <DP head type case-marked> = - <N head type generic> = + <Q_1 head type DP-initial> = + <Q_2 head type DP-final> = + <DP head type prefix> <= <Q_1 head type prefix> <DP head type suffix> <= <Q_2 head type suffix> <DP option> = QPronBoth

rule {DP option Pron - possessives, reflexives and reciprocals} DP = Pron <DP head> = <Pron head> <DP head type case-marked> = - {<Pron head type possessive> = + /<Pron head type reflexive> = + /<Pron head type reciprocal> = + } <DP head type> <= <DP head type prefix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP head type> <= <DP head type suffix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP option> = Pron

rule {DP option 0 - no Deg modifiers, not case-marked} DP = {D' / D''} <DP head> = <D' head> <DP head> = <D'' head> <DP head type> <= <DP head type prefix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP head type> <= <DP head type suffix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP head type case> = none <DP head case> = none <DP head type case-marked> = - <DP option> = 0

rule {DP option 0head - no Deg modifiers, head case-marked} DP = {D' / D''} <DP head> = <D' head> <DP head> = <D'' head> <DP head type case-marked> = - <DP head type> <= <DP head type prefix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP head type> <= <DP head type suffix> |promote clitic values to phrase <DP head type case> = none <DP head> == ~[case:none] <DP head type case-marked> <= + <DP option> = 0head

rule {DBarBar option 8fsgAposs - articles both sides, both required for singular, not possessed} D'' = Art_1 NP Art_2 <D'' head> = <NP head> <Art_1 head agr> = <D'' head agr> <Art_1 head case> = <D'' head case> <Art_2 head agr> = <D'' head agr> <Art_2 head case> = <D'' head case> <NP head agr number> = singular <NP head type mass> = - <NP head type proper> = - <NP head type possessed> = - <Art_1 head type DP-initial> = + <Art_2 head type DP-final> = + <Art_1 head type comma> = - <NP head type comma> = - <D'' head type comma> <= <Art_2 head type comma> <D'' head type prefix> <= <Art_1 head type prefix> <D'' head type suffix> <= <Art_2 head type suffix> <D'' option> = 8fsgAposs
